answers.answer: Thanks for the suggestion. We do have this on our list of to-do's. You can read about it in our announcement:http://www.medhelp.org/posts/show/603286

Hi,We just released a new Diabetes tracker today. You can get it in the Diabetes community at:http://www.medhelp.org/forums/show/46. We're going to be adding to this over the next few weeks, so please let us know your feedback. Thanks!MedHelp
